headline: Fortinet and Arista Networks Announce Joint Secure AI Data Center Solution
summary: Joint solution combines security and low-latency networking to provide a secure AI data center blueprintSUNNYVALE, Calif., Dec. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fortinet® (NASDAQ: FTNT), the global cybersecurity leader driving the convergence of networking and security, today announced a Secure AI Data Center solution, built in close collaboration with leading technology partner Arista Networks, deployed at Monolithic Power Systems (MPS). headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Monolithic Power After Its Huge AI Powered Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether Monolithic Power Systems at around $951 a share is still worth buying after its huge run, or if the easy money has already been made, you are not alone. The stock has dipped about 1.2% over the last week, but is still up 3.4% over the past month, 60.1% year to date, and 52.8% over the last year, building on multi year gains of 172.1% over 3 years and 178.5% over 5 years. Investors have been reacting to ongoing optimism around high performance power solutions for...
